transArray.content: The environment feels a bit old, but it's quiet and comfortable to sleep in

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for recognizing the hotel's environment and hygiene. We sincerely apologize for the poor stay experience caused by the overall decoration style and facilities of the room! Due to the renovation time of the hotel, there is indeed a certain gap between the hotel room facilities and the newly opened store. However, the facilities in the room are complete, and the hotel room and public area supporting facilities can meet your daily living needs. We will continue to work hard and use our Careful work brings you peace of mind and comfort during your stay. If you have any questions during your stay, you can communicate with our staff at any time. All hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy life. Hotel General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
